00058 #if !defined(AFX_SERVICE_H__CF036C2B_8EFD_45FF_94EE_4D254E5B2532__INCLUDED_)
00059 #define AFX_SERVICE_H__CF036C2B_8EFD_45FF_94EE_4D254E5B2532__INCLUDED_
00060 
00061 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00062 #pragma once
00063 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00064 
00065 #include "Method.h"
00066 #include "SBWRPC.h"
00067 
00068 namespace SystemsBiologyWorkbench
00069 {
00070 
00071 class Module ;
00072 class ServiceDescriptor ;
00073 
00075 class Service  
00076 {
00077 public:
00079         Service() { serviceId = SBWErrorService; moduleId = SBWErrorModule; }
00080 
00082         bool operator==(Service other)
00083         {
00084                 return moduleId == other.moduleId && serviceId == other.serviceId;
00085         }
00086 
00088         bool operator!=(Service other)
00089         {
00090                 return moduleId != other.moduleId || serviceId != other.serviceId;
00091         }
00092 
00093         SBW_API void getModule(Module &) ;
00094         std::vector<ServiceMethod> *getMethods();
00095         ServiceMethod getMethod(std::string signature);
00096         void getDescriptor(ServiceDescriptor &);
00097 
00098 private:
00104         Service(Integer mId, Integer sid) { moduleId = mId; serviceId = sid; }
00105 
00107         Integer serviceId;
00108 
00110         Integer moduleId;
00111 
00112         friend class Module ;
00113         friend class ServiceMethod ;
00114 };
00115 
00116 }
00117 #endif // !defined(AFX_SERVICE_H__CF036C2B_8EFD_45FF_94EE_4D254E5B2532__INCLUDED_)
